mapper.select: select * from feed_comment where is_delete = false and feed_id = #{feedId} ORDER BY comment_id DESC LIMIT #{scrollRequest.size}
select * from feed_comment where is_delete = false and feed_id = #{feedId} and comment_id < #{scrollRequest.key} ORDER BY comment_id DESC LIMIT #{scrollRequest.size}
select * from feed_comment where comment_id = #{commentId} and is_delete = false
mapper.insert: insert into feed_comment (user_id,feed_id,comment,is_delete,created_at,modified_at) values (#{userId}, #{feedId}, #{request.comment}, false, now(), now())
mapper.update: update feed_comment set comment = #{request.comment}, modified_at = now() where comment_id = #{commentId} and user_id = #{userId} and feed_id = #{feedId}
mapper.delete: update feed_comment set is_delete = true where comment_id = #{commentId} and user_id = #{userId} and feed_id = #{feedId}
